block.p: PARADE -- The annual Macy's Thanksgiving Day Parade will begin at 77th Street and Central Park West at 9 A.M. and proceed on Central Park West to Columbus Circle, then on Broadway to 34th Street.
PARADE -- The annual Macy's Thanksgiving Day Parade will begin at 77th Street and Central Park West at 9 A.M. and proceed on Central Park West to Columbus Circle, then on Broadway to 34th Street.
GOVERNMENT OFFICES -- Federal, state, and local offices will be closed.
POST OFFICE -- Express Mail only; the main post office, at 33d Street and Eighth Avenue, will be open.
PARKING -- Alternate-side street cleaning regulations will be suspended.
SANITATION -- No pickups or street cleanings.

TRANSPORTATION -- Buses and subways will be on a modified holiday schedule, with added service on the 42d Street shuttle and the Nos. 1 and 7 lines. The Metro-North and Long Island railroads will run on a modified holiday schedule with extra trains. NEW JERSEY
GOVERNMENT OFFICES -- Federal and state offices will be closed.
TRANSPORTATION -- New Jersey Transit will be on a Sunday schedule.
GOVERNMENT OFFICES -- Federal and state offices will be closed.
TRANSPORTATION -- Metro-North will be on a modified holiday schedule, with extra trains.
